business_definition: Group item containing all fields for pending authorization error log records
Date when the error occurred in YYMMDD format (PIC X(06))
Time when the error occurred in HHMMSS format (PIC X(06))
Name of the application where the error occurred (PIC X(08))
Name of the COBOL program that logged the error (PIC X(08))
Specific location or paragraph within the program where error occurred (PIC X(04))
Error severity level indicator (PIC X(01))
Condition name indicating log level error (VALUE 'L')
Condition name indicating informational level error (VALUE 'I')
Condition name indicating warning level error (VALUE 'W')
Condition name indicating critical level error (VALUE 'C')
Subsystem or component where the error originated (PIC X(01))
Condition name indicating application subsystem error (VALUE 'A')
Condition name indicating CICS subsystem error (VALUE 'C')
Condition name indicating IMS subsystem error (VALUE 'I')
Condition name indicating DB2 database subsystem error (VALUE 'D')
Condition name indicating MQ message queue subsystem error (VALUE 'M')
Condition name indicating file subsystem error (VALUE 'F')
Primary error code or return code from the subsystem (PIC X(09))
Secondary error code or reason code providing additional error details (PIC X(09))
Descriptive error message text explaining the error condition (PIC X(50))
Unique identifier or key associated with the event or transaction that caused the error (PIC X(20))
